alert.note: Alert for Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 20 at 10:11AM CDT until April 22 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Sunflower River At Sunflower affecting Sunflower County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Sunflower River At Sunflower. * WHEN...Until late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet Jeffcoat road west of river gage floods * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 22.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 16.0 feet by Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Big Sunflower River Sunflower 21.0 22.9 Tue 7 pm CDT 20.8 18.7 16.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 9 PM CDT.
